LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Smartstore.Blog
LocaleResource.Value: Adds a blog to the store.

LocaleResource.Name: RenderHeading.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the blog heading and the RSS button are displayed.

LocaleResource.Name: AltHeading.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Use 'Title' in 'General' tab to set custom heading text

LocaleResource.Name: DisableCommentCount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the number of comments within the blog image is disabled.

LocaleResource.Name: MaxPostAmount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the maximum number of blog entries displayed at the same time. Without an entered value, the upper limit is 100.

LocaleResource.Name: MaxAgeInDays.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the maximum age of displayed blog entries in days.

LocaleResource.Name: PostsWithTag.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether only blog entries with the selected tag are displayed.
